net.seliba.commandframework.api

Annotation Type Command


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Command
    Command Framework - Command
    The command annotation used to designate methods as commands. All methods should have a single CommandArgs argument

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases
      A list of alternate names that the command is executed under.
      java.lang.String description
      The description that will appear in /help of the command
      boolean inGameOnly
      Whether or not the command is available to players only
      java.lang.String inGameOnlyMessage
      Whether or not the command is available to players only
      java.lang.String noPerm
      The message sent to the player when they do not have permission to execute it
      java.lang.String permission
      Gets the required permission of the command
      java.lang.String[] tags 
      java.lang.String usage
      The usage that will appear in /help (commandname)

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of the command. If it is a sub command then its values would be separated by periods. ie. a command that would be a subcommand of test would be 'test.subcommandname'

      • permission

        public abstract java.lang.String permission
        Gets the required permission of the command
        Default:
        ""

      • noPerm

        public abstract java.lang.String noPerm
        The message sent to the player when they do not have permission to execute it
        Default:
        "You do not have permission to perform that action"

      • aliases

        public abstract java.lang.String[] aliases
        A list of alternate names that the command is executed under. See name() for details on how names work
        Default:
        {}

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        The description that will appear in /help of the command
        Default:
        ""

      • usage

        public abstract java.lang.String usage
        The usage that will appear in /help (commandname)
        Default:
        ""

      • inGameOnly

        public abstract boolean inGameOnly
        Whether or not the command is available to players only
        Default:
        false

      • inGameOnlyMessage

        public abstract java.lang.String inGameOnlyMessage
        Whether or not the command is available to players only
        Default:
        ""

      • tags

        public abstract java.lang.String[] tags
        Default:
        {}
